name: Infinite Rewinder
description:
You are waking up to an unknown place...

A robot seems to have taken care of you, but what it wants ?

Infinite Rewinder is a puzzle game where you will need to use the capacity that Rowdy (the robot) gives you, the rewind process, to get what you will need to get out of there.

Credits

Lead developer, music composer and story writer : Cacahuète Sans Sel

3D modelling : Pegasix

Images from the "Hallway of Fame" frames : Artbreeder (https://artbreeder.com/)

This game has been made for the Brackeys 2020.2 Game Jam.
